|brand = Lava |model = LR-25G |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 001 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/08/2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Lava_LR-25G001 |wlclass = AC750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, CPE |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12805D; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.36;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, (57600 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 12/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = 2 |led = 8 |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7610EN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 1 |rad2rxchains = 1 |rad2sstreams = 1 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 433 |rad2n = 150 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
